thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great visit
thread.title_full: Great visit - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Lsme1886
title: Great visit
text: Very friendly accommodating staff , lovely room great location and transport links. Reasonably priced and very good food in the room service department . Excellent breakfast . Only reason I dropped to 4 stars is a small gripe as the cocktails in the bar were very average no fruit or even lemon in a g@t and no water in the rooms which got hot in the night. Would def consider staying again though
